properties.description:
The trigger runs the pipeline PL_KHCDE_SAP_CATALYST_MASTER_POOL_LOAD at 5:01 UTC to extract data from /BIC/AZWBS_O062, /BIC/AZWBS_O072, /BIC/AZWBS_O082, /BIC/AZWBS_O022, /BIC/AZWBS_O012
 and add data into SAP_CAT_WBS_ACTUAL_COSTS_LINE_ITEMS, SAP_CAT_WBS_COMMITMENT_LINE_ITEMS, SAP_CAT_WBS_BUDGET_LINE_ITEMS, SAP_CAT_WBS_BUDGET_DATA_FACT, SAP_CAT_WBS_PLAN_DATA_FACT
